backend/main.mo: Defines access-controlled user profiles and challenge management, including creation, status checks, participant handling, and blob-backed recordings.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files, describing their roles in routing, i18n, UI, and state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme tokens and dark mode variables defining color system and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth, challenge status, URL-synced screen navigation, and rendering appropriate screens.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered container, responsive scroll area, and RTL-aware language switcher placement.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button integrating Internet Identity with translated labels, login/logout logic, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer diagnostics panel showing auth state, principal, and controls for login/logout and query refresh.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two translated info popups using SharedPopup with detailed content sections. Provides buttons that open dialogs for social contemplation and challenge information.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Dropdown button allowing users to switch the app language using available translation codes. Updates language and respects RTL direction.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wrapper component that handles loading and error states for react-query results. Shows loaders or error messages before rendering children with query data.
frontend/src/components/RecordingFeedbac: Displays live recording feedback including timer, mic pulse animation, audio level meter, and reassurance text. Reacts to audio level and RTL direction and hides when not visible.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Reusable dialog wrapper providing consistent layout, scrolling, and RTL support. Wraps shadcn Dialog components and renders provided trigger and content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, initializing admin access when applicable. Invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Hook managing audio recording, producing a blob, tracking audio level and elapsed time, and handling cleanup. Uses MediaRecorder and Web Audio API for live feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication status and principal string from Internet Identity. Determines if the identity is non-anonymous.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status flags. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes login and clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, challenge status, active challenge IDs, and related mutation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Standalone hook fetching the user's challenge status via React Query.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Provides i18n context, language persistence, translation lookup, and document direction updates.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the full translation dictionary for multiple languages and app text sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with theming variables, dark mode, and RTL-aware utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, identity provider, styles, and rendering App.
Placeholder UI for the landing screen showing app intro text, features, and login CTA using i18n.
Placeholder screen for users without an active challenge, handling invite parsing, join flow, and state refresh.
UI for creating and managing a challenge, including date selection, invitation codes, participant management, and creator/participant actions.
frontend/src/screens/Screen5ManageChalle: Displays current challenge participants with refresh and leave functionality, handling missing challenge state recovery.
Static placeholder view showing challenge info, edit navigation, and informational popups.
Main in-challenge screen handling tabs, day navigation, participant selection, audio recording, playback, and URL state sync.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Reads, writes, and clears app navigation state from URL search parameters while preserving other query parameters.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed 7‑day challenge assignments and their text content used across the app.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Persists and retrieves the active challenge ID in sessionStorage to maintain context across refreshes.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats a challenge day header using start time and day index to produce readable weekday and date labels.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase alphanumeric invitation codes using a restricted character set.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Provides helpers to build, parse, and clear invitation-related URL parameters while preserving navigation state.
Normalizes and sanitizes error messages, blocking a known bogus migration message and mapping common backend errors to user-friendly text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters from query or hash, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the dapp’s features, architecture, and existing functionality for planning and tracking.
